Sentencas: Conversion of biomass in syngas by means of indirect gasification offers the option to improve the economic situation of any fuel cell system due to lower costs for feedstock and higher power revenues in many European countries.
Titulo: Conversion of Syngas From Biomass in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The coupling of an indirect gasification of biomass and residues with highly efficient solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) systems is therefore a promising technology for reaching economic feasibility of small decentralized combined heat and power production (CHP).The predicted efficiency of common high temperature fuel cell systems with integrated gasification of solid feedstock is usually significantly lower than the efficiency of fuel cells operated with hydrogen or methane.
Titulo: Conversion of Syngas From Biomass in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Additional system components like the gasifier as well as the gas cleaning reduce this efficiency.
Titulo: Conversion of Syngas From Biomass in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Hence common fuel cell systems with integrated gasification of biomass will hardly reach electrical efficiencies above 30%.
Titulo: Conversion of Syngas From Biomass in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: An extraordinary efficient combination is achieved in case that the fuel cells waste heat is used in an indirect gasification system.
Titulo: Conversion of Syngas From Biomass in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A simple combination of a SOFC and an allothermal gasifier enables then electrical efficiencies above 50%.
Titulo: Conversion of Syngas From Biomass in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: However, this system requires an innovative cooling concept for the fuel cell stack.
Titulo: Conversion of Syngas From Biomass in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Another significant question is the influence of impurities on the fuel cell degradation.
Titulo: Conversion of Syngas From Biomass in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The European Research Project BioCellus focuses on both questions-the influence of the biogenous syngas on the fuel cells and an innovative cooling concept based on liquid metal heat pipes.
Titulo: Conversion of Syngas From Biomass in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: First experiments showed that, in particular, higher hydrocarbons-the so-called tars-do not have any significant influence on the performance of SOFC membranes.
Titulo: Conversion of Syngas From Biomass in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The innovative concept of the TopCycle comprises to heat an indirect gasifier with the exhaust heat of the fuel cell by means of liquid metal heat-pipes.
Titulo: Conversion of Syngas From Biomass in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Internal cooling of the stack and the recirculation of waste heat increases the system efficiency significantly.
Titulo: Conversion of Syngas From Biomass in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This concept promises electrical efficiencies of above 50% even for small-scale systems without any combined processes.
Titulo: Conversion of Syngas From Biomass in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
